totalSwitchdesc:
If the items you want to hide are related to the commercial part of Source, please consider donating to @D and @V (not me) as they live by writing open-source code.
v1.0.2
listenImplementationdesc: It is recommended to choose the DOMNodeInserted option for the best overall performance, but this option will output a warning in the terminal. If you cannot accept this, please choose one of the other two implementations.
reload_hint: Reload the interface to apply the latest changes.
old_config_exist:
Remove Button Plugin:
Due to a performance improvement refactoring of the configuration storage system in the latest version, please uninstall and reinstall the Remove Button Plugin after seeing this prompt. Enter the configuration in the settings interface again to ensure performance and stability. Thank you for your understanding.
This prompt will appear only once per device after correct reinstallation. If you still see this prompt after reinstalling, please uninstall the Remove Button Plugin first and report the bug to the developer.
rm_menu_desc:
Enter the label names of the interface language (e.g., "Copy, Move" without quotes). If using multiple languages, please enter the label names for all languages (e.g., "Copy, Copy, Move, Move" without quotes).
Separate with English or Chinese half-width commas, i.e., "," or "，".
rm_top_title: Top and Bottom Bar Buttons to Hide
rm_top_desc:
❗Please do not hide functional icons, such as close buttons, unless necessary❗
Fill in the provided tag name strings (e.g., "barSync, barBack") separated by English or Chinese half-width commas, i.e., "," or "，".
Options:
Item to HideString (Double-click to select)
🔃 Sync ButtonbarSync
⬅️ Back ButtonbarBack
➡️ Forward ButtonbarForward
🧩 Plugin ButtonbarPlugins
🔍 Search ButtonbarSearch
☀🌙 Day/Night Mode ButtonbarMode
🔌 Exit Button (iPad and Android Tablets)barExit
➖⬛❌ Window Controls ButtonwindowControls
👑 Crown IcontoolbarVIP
❓ Bottom Bar Help ButtonstatusHelp
🪟 Bottom Bar Hidden Sidebar ButtonbarDock
rm_side_desc:
Enter the provided label name strings (e.g., "outline, tag" without quotes)
Separate with English or Chinese half-width commas, i.e., "," or "，".
Options:
Items to HideInput String (Double-click to select)
📄 Outline Iconoutline
✉️ Inbox Iconinbox
📑 Bookmark Iconbookmark
🔖 Tag Icontag
🔗 Backlink Iconbacklink
⚛️ Global Graph IconglobalGraph
⚛️ Individual Notebook Graph Icongraph
ignore_warning: remove button plugin: the warning above is just because you choosed a high performance observing implementation, if you don't like it, you may choose the other two selections in the setting panel. thank you
